Plintissa followed Prowl when he walks to the CR Chamber. (When, i'm not
contolling him I only said when.) She was very concerned about Iron
Raptor...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 5:34 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus::
>
> Prowl's eyes follow Iron Raptor as she walks toward the Ark. He walks off
> after her but also stops as he hears the predacon's transmission.
>
> Prowl looks at Iron Raptor as she begins her sentence about backstabing
bots,
> but doesn't catch the last several words as Iron Raptor nearly fell in
pain.
> He walks up to her, passing Plintissa.
>
> "I think I should carry you to the CR chambers," he says, his concern
clearly
> written in his eyes and heard in his voice as he puts out a hand to steady
> her. From the look she had in her eyes earlier, he wasn't sure wether to
take
> her to the CR chambers or her quarters.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker sits down in the war room, waiting for the meeting to begin when
he
> hears shots outside. He growls, taking out his gun and running toward the
> shots.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus shruggs, not knowing the answer to Ramhorn's questions.
>
> "I have no idea. Last thing I remember was being shot by predacons," he
says,
> "And then I woke up in a CR chamber."
>
